```{=html}
<script defer src="../functions/submit.js"></script>
<main class="main_contact">
<h2>Contact Us</h2>
<form>
  <div class="input">
    <label for="name">Full Name*</label>
    <input id="name" type="text" name="name"
    required />
  </div>

  <div class="input">
    <label for="jobtitle">Job Title*</label>
    <input id="jobtitle" type="text" name="jobtitle" required />
  </div>
    
  <div class="input">
    <label for="name">Company Name*</label>
    <input id="companyname" type="text" name="companyname" required />
  </div>

  <div class="input">
    <label for="email">Email Address*</label>
    <input id="email" type="email" name="email" required />
  </div>

  <div class="input">
    <label for="helptype">What type of help do you need?*</label>
    <select id="helptype" name="helptype" required>
      <option hidden disabled selected value>Select One</option>
      <option value="MandS">Modeling and Simulation</option>
      <option value="ensembles">Ensembles</option>
      <option value="training">Training/Coaching</option>
      <option value="opensience">Open Science</option>
      <option value="other">Other</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <div class="input">
    <label for="message">Specific Question</label>
    <textarea id="message" name="message"></textarea>
  </div>
  <input type="submit"/>
  <div>
    <p id="result-text"></p>
  </div>
</form>
</main>
```
